metadata.title: CVE-2018-6790 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in KDE Plasma Workspace before 5.12.0.dataengines/notifications/notificationsengine.cpp allows remote attackersto discover client IP addresses via a URL in a notification, asdemonstrated by the src attribute of an IMG element.

criterions.comment: kde-workspace: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
